item.description:
Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at MFA First Fridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery (Gallery 250) for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and delicious tapas available for purchase. Relax and unwind in a beautiful setting with friends both old and new.  With local band, Little Bang.

This will be a joint meetup with the Boston Canadian expat group.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Firsty Friday: MFA First Friday
